reviews.text: Stayed at the Streaky Bay Hotel Motel for a night on an 8 day, 5,800km motorbike ride from Perth to Darwin. If you're ever in this corner of Australia - the Eyre Peninsula - Streaky Bay is a must stop place on the itinerary and the Hotel Motel is definitely recommended for the stopover.
reviews.title: Great place to go, great place to stay
